label: ABC2_hP8_194_c_a_f-007
title: AlCCr$_{2}$ Structure
comments: Note that all of the atoms sit on close-packed $<$$0001$$>$ planes. The stacking sequence may be written \begin{center} \begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|c|c|c|} \hline Atom & Cr & C & Cr & Al & Cr & C & Cr & Al \\ \hline Position & B & A & C & B & C & A & B & C \\ \hline \end{tabular} \end{center}
